text: #include<stdio.h> #includesstdlib.h> #includespthread. h> tinclude"common. threads.h" sem t tobak; sem t papir; sem t lighter; sem t tobak penge; sem t papir penge; sem t lighter penge; void * tobak pusher(void *arg){ for(int 1=0;1<2000;1++){ sem post(&tobak); sem wait(&tobak penge); ) ) void " papir pusher(void *arg){ for(int 1=0;1<2000;1++){ sem post (&papir); sem wait(&papir penge); ) ) void * lighter pusher(void "arg)( for(int 1=0;1<2000;1++){ sem post(&lighter); sem wait(&lighter penge); ) ) void " ryger med tobak(void "arg)( for(int 1=0;1<1000;1++){ sem wait(&papir); sem wait(&lighter); printf("Kld ryger cigaret %d \n", (long)arg, 1); sem post (&papir penge); sem post(&lighter penge); ) printf("Kld ryger dÃ¸dn", (long)arg); F
